author: veithen
msg: Mail and VFS transports: Corrected an obvious mistake where getActionAfterProcess was used instead of getActionAfterFailure. Also removed a case statement for PollTableEntry.WITH_ERRORS since we can never encounter this value at that point.

author: bago
msg: better to use a single module even when "refactored" to avoid module prolification and adding a new layer to the ant build.
